headline: Ask HN: Monitoring Hard-Disk Drive Array Health in Linux in 2022?
description:
What is the best way to automate monitoring and alerting on the SMART status health for a Linux machine containing 15 hard-disk drives along with 1x RAID-0, 1x RAID-1, and 1x RAID-5 arrays?

Curious what a highly-effective / cutting-edge / best-practices setup looks like in 2022.

Thank you!
